title: CTRL0000050583 - Deposition of Nicholas J. Fuentes, (Feb. 16, 2022)

data.text: JANUARY 6TH ATTACK ON THE U.S. CAPITOL,
The deposition in the above matter was held via Webex, commencing at 2:11 p.m.
For the SELECT COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE
THE JANUARY 6TH ATTACK ON THE U.S. CAPITOL:
We'll go on the record at 2:10 p.m. eastern.
